synapse.name: Modified LuoRudy Model
synapse.description: This is a modified version of the LuoRudy Model.

synapse.name: Resistive Gap Junction
synapse.description: This is a simple resistive gap junction model.

synapse.name: Resistive Gap Junction 2
synapse.description: This is a simple resistive gap junction model.

synapse.name: Resistive Gap Junction 3
synapse.description: This is a simple resistive gap junction model.

synapse.name: Resistive Gap Junction 4
synapse.description: This is a simple resistive gap junction model.

nwsolver.name: GMRES/Parallel solver
nwsolver.description: This is the GMRES solver using a parallel solver.

nwsolver.name: GMRES/Parallel solver (test result)
nwsolver.description: This is the GMRES solver using a parallel solver.

nwsolver.name: GMRES/Single solver (test result)
nwsolver.description: This is the GMRES solver using a single processor.

nwsolver.name: GMRES/Single solver
nwsolver.description: This is the GMRES solver using a single processor.

nwsolver.name: CG/Parallel solver
nwsolver.description: This is the Conjungate Gradient solver using a parallel solver.

nwsolver.name: CG/Single solver
nwsolver.description: This is the Conjungate Gradient solver using a single processor.

nwsolver.name: CG/Parallel solver (test result)
nwsolver.description: This is the Conjungate Gradient solver using a parallel solver.

nwsolver.name: CG/Single solver (test result)
nwsolver.description: This is the Conjungate Gradient solver using a single processor.

nwtimestep.name: Semi-Implicit Timestepper
nwtimestep.description: This is currently the only timestepper for the discrete multidomain available.

nwtimestep.name: Adaptive Semi-Implicit Timestepper
nwtimestep.parameters: adaptive=yes dt=0.005 dt0=0.0005 dtmax=0.05 dtmin=5e-05 dtstim=5e-05 dtfactor=1 tfinal=1500
nwtimestep.description: This is currently the only timestepper for the discrete multidomain available.

output.name: SCIRun output
output.parameters: # Parameters OutputSCIRun scirun_dump_vm=yes scirun_dump_vi=no scirun_dump_ve=no scirun_dump_vb=no scirun_dump_q=no scirun_dump_r=no scirun_dump_b=no scirun_dump_time=yes # number of steps between recordings scirun_dump_step=100 # numer of steps in one file scirun_dump_size=20
output.description: The configuration writes a series of output files with a header file that can be read into SCIRun. The 'dumpstep' parameter can be used to set the number of timeframes in a single file. All the separate files are linked by one NRRD header file.

output.name: SCIRun/Text output
output.parameters:
# Parameters OutputSCIRun scirun_dump_vm=yes scirun_dump_vi=no scirun_dump_ve=no scirun_dump_vb=no scirun_dump_q=no scirun_dump_r=no scirun_dump_b=no scirun_dump_time=yes # Number of steps between recordings scirun_dump_step=100 # Number of steps in one file scirun_dump_size=20
# Parameters OutputText printspacing=0.005 printnodes=0 printvm=yes printvi=no printve=no printq=no printaux=no printtime=no
output.description: This configuration writes a series of output files with a header file that can be read into SCIRun. The 'dumpstep' parameter can be used to set the number of timeframes in a single file. All the separate files are linked by one NRRD header file. This configuration as well writes text files of a certain node to be able to track progress.

output.name: Dump/Text output
output.parameters:
# Parameters OutputDump dumpspacing=0.005 dumpvm=yes dumpvi=no dumpve=no dumpvb=no dumpq=no dumpaux=no dumptime=no
# Parameters OutputText printspacing=0.005 printnodes=0 printvm=yes printvi=no printve=no printq=no printaux=no printtime=no
output.description: This configuration is the default CardioWave way of outputting data. Unfortunately there is no easy way of importing data in this format into SCIRun as it is a pure memory dump of the results. Hence only use this one if the results are not to be displayed in SCIRun.

neurowave.parameters: beta=1.0 cm=1.0 loadstate=no savestate=no restartfile=cwmodel.restart autorestart=false ckptfile=check ckptinterval=1.0 useauxvars=no

cardiowave.parameters: beta=1.0 cm=1.0 loadstate=no savestate=no loadfile=restart.load savefile=restart.save statefile=restart checkpoint=no ckptfile=check ckptinterval=1.0 useauxvars=no
